mainText:
As I sit here typing this I can't believe he is really gone.  Although, it was clear that the end was near;  there is no way to prepare for the loss of a man like Steve Jobs.
His brilliance will always be remembered.  56 is far too young.  
I am truly heartbroken.
I thank Steve Jobs and the whole Apple family for bringing me so much happiness through your products and your vision.
author: Nancy
